txt.en: The leader of the Jeweller's Guild has asked you to create a guild-pattern ithilharn cabochon to show to the Scholar's Guild for study.
The crafting recipes you must create can be bartered for from the Improved Recipes vendor.\n\nCreate a a guild-pattern ithilharn cabochon.
Execute the recipe for a guild-pattern ithilharn cabochon

'Hello jeweller. Our scholar friends have taken an interest in ithilharn. They want to compare them to other gems in some sort of in-depth study. Please prepare some samples for them. A few cabochons of different gems should be perfect.'

'Hello jeweller. Our scholar friends have taken an interest in ithilharn. They want to compare them to other gems in some sort of in-depth study. Please prepare some samples for them. A few cabochons of different gems should be perfect.'
Turn in a guild-pattern ithilharn cabochon ([placeholder]/[placeholder]) to Aldúlf
'It's fascinating to see how a single gem can be shaped in so many different ways.'
Talk to the Jeweller's Guild Leader in Minas Morgul
Turn in a guild-pattern ithilharn cabochon ([placeholder]/[placeholder]) to the Jeweller's Guild Leader in Minas Morgul
'It's fascinating to see how a single gem can be shaped in so many different ways.'
